content: Parker-Hannifin Corp   whose motion and control systems are used in a variety of industries  said on Thursday it would buy Clarcor Inc  for about $4.3 billion  including debt  to double the size of its filtration systems business.

title: Parker-Hannifin to buy Clarcor to double filtration systems business
